TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class ImportCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 导入 控件（或其他用作 控件的 ASP.NET 服务器控件）的说明文件，以便用户可以使用预定义的设置将控件添加到网页中。

span.span: Imports a description file for a control (or other ASP.NET server control used as a control), so that users can add the control to a Web page with pre-defined settings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用户能够导入说明文件，用于描述设置控件或用户想要将添加到的服务器控件区域。The control enables users to import a description file that describes settings on a control or server control that a user wants to add to a zone. 用户导入一个说明文件之后,在文件中引用的控件出现在控制和用户可以将控件添加到页。After a user imports a description file, the control referenced in the file appears within the control, and a user can add the control to the page. 描述文件不是控件本身相同。The description file is not the same as the control itself. 它是一个 XML 文件的末尾。Web 部件扩展并包含名称/值对-主要属性值-描述的控件的状态。It is an XML file that ends with a .WebPart extension and contains name/value pairs--mostly property values--that describe the state of the control. 说明文件创建根据指定的 XML 格式，如本主题中所述[Web 部件控制描述文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)。The description file is created according to a specified XML format, as described in the topic [Web Parts Control Description Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8). 用于描述文件引用的控件，它既可以编译到程序集，也可以是用户控件的.ascx 文件中定义。As for the control that the description file refers to, it can either be compiled into an assembly, or it can be a user control defined in an .ascx file. 在任一情况下，在导入的说明文件中引用的控件必须存在承载尝试导入控件的网页的 Web 服务器上。In either case, the control referenced in an imported description file must exist on the Web server that hosts the page that is attempting to import the control. 描述文件引用包含该控件的控件名称和程序集 （或文件） 并说明文件包含影响控件的属性值、 外观和行为的设置。The description file references the control name and the assembly (or file) that contains the control, and the description file contains settings that affect the control's property values, appearance, and behavior. 控件使用户能够共享控件上的设置。The control enables users to share settings on controls. 为复杂控件可以具有许多属性和设置。A complex control can have many properties and settings. 例如，在一家大型公司，自定义内的典型的 intranet 站点控件可能包含多个保存值特定于用户的环境，例如其数据库连接、 部门信息等的属性。For example, in a typical intranet site within a large company, a custom control might contain a number of properties that hold values specific to the users' environment, such as their database connections, departmental information, and so on. 该控件还可能包含多个会影响其外观的属性。The control might also contain a number of properties that affect its appearance. 一个用户无法对特定站点上的控件进行个性化设置和使其正常工作、 导出说明文件进行控制，以及然后与其他用户，用户可以导入的文件完全配置的控件添加到其他 intranet 共享说明文件允许其进行个性化的站点。One user could personalize the control on a particular site and get it working properly, export a description file for the control, and then share the description file with other users, who could import the file to add the fully configured control to other intranet sites that they are allowed to personalize. 只要编译的程序集或包含控件的用户控件文件存在承载其站点的 Web 服务器上，用户可以将控件添加到其他网站。As long as the compiled assembly or user control file containing the control exists on the Web server that is hosting their site, users can add the control to other Web sites. 依据用户导入说明文件 （并且因此控制及其关联的服务器） 到 Web 页的机制是控件，页面开发人员必须将添加到 Web 页。The mechanism by which users import a description file (and hence its associated server control) into a Web page is the control, which a page developer must add to a Web page. 当用户切换到目录显示模式页面控件随即显示，并且用户可以浏览到此控件。他们想要导入到服务器控件对应的 web 部件说明文件。When a user switches the page to catalog display mode, the control appears, and the user can user this control to browse to the .WebPart description file corresponding to the server control they want to import. 以下用户界面和提供的说明控件，用户便可将所需的服务器控件添加到 Web 页中，使用其外观和完全导入的说明文件中配置为指定的属性。Following the UI and instructions provided by the control, a user is able to add the desired server control into the Web page, with its appearance and properties fully configured as specified in the imported description file. 之前控件的说明文件可以导入，用户必须先创建 （导出） 文件基于现有控件。Before a control's description file can be imported, a user must first create (export) the file based on an existing control. 可以为一个控件导出说明文件，如果满足以下条件：A description file can be exported for a control if the following conditions are met: - 该控件具有使用标记的属性`Personalizable`属性。The control has properties marked with the `Personalizable` attribute. - 将 Web.config 文件`enableExport`属性设置为值`true`上``元素。The Web.config file has the `enableExport` attribute value set to `true` on the `` element. - 开发人员设置的值属性的默认值以外的值在控件上，该值禁止导出。A developer sets the value of the property on the control to a value other than the default value of , which prohibits export. 如果属性值设置为，任何属性，其中包含参数与`Personalizable`属性不会导出时用户导出说明文件。If the property value is set to , any property that contains an parameter with a `Personalizable` attribute is not exported when a user exports a description file. 这使控件开发人员，以防止敏感数据，如连接字符串，在某些情况下被导出。This enables control developers to prevent sensitive data, such as connection strings, from being exported in certain situations. 用户可以导出一个通过单击出现在谓词菜单的控件，并按照的说明保存导出谓词启用为导出的控件。Web 部件控件的说明文件。A user can export a control that has been enabled for export by clicking the export verb that appears in the verbs menu of the control, and following the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 然后，其他用户可以导入此文件来配置其自己的控件的实例。Other users can then import this file to configure their own instances of the control. 类包含多个属性。The class contains several properties. 属性包含有关用户的说明文本，在浏览以找到说明文件时。The property contains text with instructions for users when they browse to locate the description file. 属性包含作为导入控件的标签中显示的文本控件。The property contains text that serves as a label for the imported control as it appears within the control. 包含导入控件说明时出错时显示的文本。The contains text that is displayed if an error occurs when a control description is being imported. 属性重写基属性，以分配的默认标题控制如果开发人员不会分配一个标题。The property overrides the base property to assign a default title for an control if the developer does not assign a title. 属性包含为在用户单击可以上载说明文件中，按钮文本和属性包含上传过程的说明。The property contains the text for the button that the user clicks to upload the description file, and the property contains the instructions for the upload process. 类还包含几个唯一的方法。The class also contains several unique methods. 方法检索每个对象控制在目录中，从而使控件来显示有关每个服务器控件的信息，而无需创建它的一个实例。The method retrieves a object for each control in the catalog, which enables an control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of it. 方法获取的特定实例控制，根据传递给方法的说明。The method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. 有一些与使用相关的固有风险控件。There are some inherent risks associated with using the control. 例如，通过用于导入的 description 文件中导入你的 Web 应用程序的恶意数据的可能性。One example is the possibility of importing malicious data into your Web application through the description files used for importing. 如果有人将恶意脚本代码放作为说明文件中的字符串属性的值，则当用户导入说明文件，并将引用的服务器控件添加到 Web 页时，就可能会执行该脚本。If someone has placed malicious script code as the value of a string property in the description file, then that script could potentially be executed when a user imports the description file and adds the referenced server control to a Web page. 若要导入带有恶意数据说明文件的风险降至最低，服务器控件，具有字符串类型属性应始终对属性数据进行编码。To minimize the risk of importing description files with malicious data, server controls that have string-typed properties should always encode the property data. 另一种风险涉及通过说明文件导入类型 (请参阅[Web 部件控制描述文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8))。Another risk involves importing types through description files (see [Web Parts Control Description Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)). 恶意用户无法提交请求以加载到多个程序集，从而导致过多所占用的内存量。A malicious user could submit requests to load many assemblies into the , resulting in an excessive amount of memory being consumed. 若要避免与导入相关的风险，您可以禁用该功能完全不使用导入功能或控件。To avoid the risks associated with import, you can disable the feature altogether by not using the import feature or the control. 或者，可以限制哪些用户有权访问该控件。Or you can limit what users have access to the control. 无法执行此操作，以编程方式使用角色管理 (请参阅[使用角色管理授权](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01954ce4-39a2-487f-8153-a69f6f6f3195))。You could do this programmatically, using role management (see [Managing Authorization Using Roles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01954ce4-39a2-487f-8153-a69f6f6f3195)). 例如，页面加载时，您无法测试以查看用户是否属于特定角色时，如管理员角色。For instance, when the page loads, you could test to see whether a user is in a certain role, such as the administrator role. 如果用户是角色中，你可以以编程方式添加到该用户的页控件。If the user is in the role, you could programmatically add the control to the page for that user. 此外可以使用声明性方法来限制的一组用户可以使用控件。You could also use a declarative approach to limit the set of users that can use the control. 无法在 web 页包含目录中放置两个控件： 一个用于可以导入的用户，另一个用于那些不能。Within your web page that contains a catalog, you could place two controls: one for users who can import, and one for those who cannot. 可以导入的用户的区域将包含控件。The zone for users who can import would contain the control. 区域本身无法放置在控件，这使您可以限制到区域中控件的使用，仅那些经过身份验证，用户或您指定的角色。The zone itself could be placed inside of a control, which would enable you to limit use of the control in the zone to only those authenticated users or roles that you specify. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控制以声明方式和以编程方式在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively and programmatically on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个控件。A Web page that contains a control and an control. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 您应将以下源代码放在一个文件并将其命名 Displaymodemenucs.ascx 或 Displaymodemenuvb.ascx （具体取决于哪种语言使用）。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在页面的顶部是两个`register`指令、 用户控件和包含两个自定义的已编译组件控件。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 请注意，页面都有对的声明性引用控件，嵌套在适当的层次结构的声明性的元素。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 还要注意几个属性值分配以声明方式在``元素。Notice also that several property values are assigned declaratively on the `` element. 此外，`Button1_Click`方法上更新的属性值数目控件。Also, the `Button1_Click` method updates a number of property values on the control. 在页面的控件、 两个自定义控件声明。In the page's control, the two custom controls are declared. ``控件具有`exportmode="all"`上它的属性。The `` control has an `exportmode="all"` attribute on it. 此属性需要使用户能够导出该控件，然后由其他用户想要导入控件使用此说明文件导入的描述文件。This attribute is required to enable users to export a description file for the control, which can then be imported by other users who wish to import the control using the description file. > [!NOTE] > 若要启用 Web 部件应用程序导出导入的用户控件，还必须启用 Web 应用程序中的导出功能，通过添加`enableExport="true"`属性为``元素 (即子``元素) 的 Web.config 文件中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 默认情况下禁用导出，因此如果尚未为应用程序启用导出，编辑 Web.config 文件，并立即执行操作。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三个部分是为两个源代码控件。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 请注意，这些控件上的某些属性标有`WebBrowsable`属性。Notice that some properties on these controls are marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 这使控件为用户编辑这些属性在控件处于编辑模式时动态生成用户界面 (UI)。This enables the control to dynamically generate the user interface (UI) for a user to edit those properties when the controls are in edit mode. 属性也会标记与`WebDisplayName`属性，指定在编辑用户界面中每个控件旁边显示的标签的文本。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 调用自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`与网页上引用``元素。The custom control called `TextDisplayWebPart` is referenced on the Web page with an `` element. 其他控件，名为`UserInfoWebPart`，也被声明在网页上最初，但将删除它更高版本才能演示导入控件的描述文件的功能。The other control, called `UserInfoWebPart`, is also declared on the Web page initially, though you will remove it later to demonstrate the ability to import a description file for a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 现在运行的代码示例。Now run the code example. 加载浏览器中的网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一步是编辑`UserInfoWebPart`控件。The first step is to edit the `UserInfoWebPart` control. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**编辑**切换到编辑模式的页。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Edit** to switch the page to edit mode. 单击的谓词菜单`UserInfoWebPart`控件 （标题栏中的向下箭头），并单击**编辑**。Click the verbs menu of the `UserInfoWebPart` control (the downward arrow in the title bar), and then click **Edit**. 编辑 UI 出现时，多个编辑控件将显示下面`UserInfoWebPart`控件，可以用于编辑的字段值。When the editing UI appears, several editing controls appear below the `UserInfoWebPart` control that you can use to edit its field values. 编辑某些字段，请单击**确定**，然后使用**显示模式**返回页后，可以浏览模式下的下拉列表。Edit some fields, click **OK**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down to return the page to browse mode. 第二步是导出。Web 部件描述文件`UserInfoWebPart`控件。The second step is to export a .WebPart description file for the `UserInfoWebPart` control. 单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头），在自定义控件上的谓词菜单，然后单击**导出**。Click the verbs menu on the custom control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照说明进行操作以保存。Web 部件控件的说明文件。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 现在关闭网页，并编辑网页源代码编辑器中。Now close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除``控制声明元素，然后保存并关闭文件。Delete the `` control declaration element, then save and close the file. (执行此步骤的模拟的用户还没有`UserInfoWebPart`控件，以便可以导入页上的控件)。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have the `UserInfoWebPart` control, so you can import the control to the page). 加载 Web 页，再次在浏览器中。Load the Web page again in a browser. `UserInfoWebPart`控件不应出现，因为已删除了它。The `UserInfoWebPart` control should not appear, because you removed it. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**目录**以切换到目录模式的页面。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在中控件中，单击**浏览**按钮，并浏览到。Web 部件文件所创建的然后单击**上传**按钮。In the control, click the **Browse** button, and browse to the .WebPart file you created, then click the **Upload** button. 对控件的引用应显示有一个它旁边的复选框。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 选择该复选框，然后单击**添加**控件添加到页面。Select the check box, then click **Add** to add the control to the page. 虽然在此视图中的页中，单击**更新 ImportCatalogPart**靠近底部的页后，可以看到以编程方式更新上的属性值数目的效果的按钮控件。While you are in this view of the page, click the **Update ImportCatalogPart** button near the bottom of the page to see the effect of programmatically updating a number of property values on the control. 单击按钮后，观察如何在 UI 中更改的各种属性。After clicking the button, observe how the various properties are changed in the UI. 最后，单击**关闭**退出目录模式并返回页后，可以浏览模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. `UserInfoWebPart`控件现在应显示在页中，包含先前导出时的值。The `UserInfoWebPart` control should now appear in the page, containing the values that it had when you exported it earlier.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认值; 没有构造函数声明中类，因此没有特殊任务执行时创建类的新实例。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 在内部使用构造函数创建类的实例。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 通常情况下将不需要使用构造函数以编程方式在自己的代码。Normally you will not need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控件的使用目的是页面开发人员将其添加到页面以声明方式在设计时。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public string BrowseHelpText { get; set; }
.property instance string BrowseHelpText
Public Property BrowseHelpText As String
public: property System::String ^ BrowseHelpText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BrowseHelpText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一条文本消息，该消息指示用户浏览至一个说明文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a text message that instructs users to browse to the location of a description file.

value.span: 包含文本消息的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the message.

value.span: 默认值是一条由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的消息。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific message supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为用户提供他们也必须执行过程中将导入的控件添加第一件事的简单概述： 通过在路径中键入或浏览到该文件提供说明文件的位置。The property gives users a simple overview of the first thing they must do in the process of adding an imported control: provide the location of a description file, by either typing in a path or browsing to the file. 提供此属性的自定义值的典型原因是如果你提供的特殊说明对于用户，例如特定的网络共享到的用户应浏览到说明文件。A typical reason to supply a custom value for this property is if you have special instructions for users, such as a specific network share to which they should browse to locate a description file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关完整的代码以及运行该示例中，所需的说明，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码段，请注意，控件以声明方式设置属性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#2)] 在本部分中的代码，以编程方式分配属性值。In this section of code, the property value is assigned programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#3)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以使用**显示模式**要选择的下拉列表控件**目录模式**并切换到目录模式的页面。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to select **Catalog Mode** and switch the page to catalog mode. 使用目录模式和上载说明文件中的页面，请注意各种用户界面 (UI) 中显示的文本字符串控件。With the page in catalog mode and the description file uploaded, note the various text strings displayed in the user interface (UI) for the control. 如果单击**上载说明文件**按钮，几个属性在 UI 中的文本已更改，包括的文本属性。If you click the **Upload Description File** button, the text for several of the properties in the UI is changed, including the text for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的代码将重写基属性继承自类设计器中隐藏该属性并防止它受主题影响。The code for this property overrides the base property inherited from the class to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes. 尽管它是公共的此属性设置此控件的默认呈现的 Web 部件控件在内部使用，不应由页面开发人员使用。Though it is public, this property is used internally by the Web Parts control set for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be used by page developers. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供实现的抽象基方法中声明为类。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法返回在目录中的每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 请注意，对于控件，可以有一个服务器控件目录中一次，即使方法会起作用，如果有多个控件。Note that in the case of an control, there can be only one server control in the catalog at a time, even though the method would work if there were multiple controls. 一个对象是包含有关的基本信息的对象控件，包括其 ID，对该控件，并继承自的几个重要属性的值的对象引用类，如和。A object is an object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法将会提升性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录后，它需要一些信息，包括标题、 说明、 图标 （如果存在） 和一个 id。 每个控件When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不是无需创建要获取此信息，每个控件的实例区域创建一个目录调用方法，并在调用返回仅控件而不是实例的说明信息控件。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method, and the call returns only the description information for the control rather than an instance of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在网页上的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个控件，以及使用的代码方法。A Web page that contains a control and an control, along with code that uses the method. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 您应将以下源代码放在一个文件并将其命名 Displaymodemenucs.ascx 或 Displaymodemenuvb.ascx （具体取决于哪种语言使用）。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在页面的顶部是两个`register`指令、 用户控件和包含两个自定义的已编译组件控件。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 这两种控件中页的标记以声明方式引用。Both of these controls are referenced declaratively in the markup of the page. 上的声明性引用控件 (同时开头`aspSample`前缀)，请注意，每个都`exportMode="all"`属性添加到它。On the declarative references to the controls (both begin with an `aspSample` prefix), note that each has an `exportMode="all"` attribute added to it. 此属性，可导出。Web 部件控件，将在更高版本中使用，以将控件导入到一个页面的步骤说明文件。This attribute enables you to export a .WebPart description file for the control, which you will use in a later to step to import the control to a page. > [!NOTE] > 若要启用 Web 部件应用程序导出导入的用户控件，还必须启用 Web 应用程序中的导出功能，通过添加`enableExport="true"`属性为``元素 (即子``元素) 的 Web.config 文件中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 默认情况下禁用导出，因此如果尚未为应用程序启用导出，编辑 Web.config 文件，并立即执行操作。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. Web 页还提供的声明性引用控件，嵌套在适当的层次结构的声明性的元素。The Web page also has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 方法调用的代码内`Button1_Click`方法。The method is called within the code for the `Button1_Click` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/ImportCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/ImportCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三个部分是为两个源代码控件。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 现在运行的代码示例。Now run the code example. 加载浏览器中的网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一步是导出。每个 web 部件说明文件控件 (有关`TextDisplayWebPart`以及`UserInfoWebPart`控件)。The first step is export a .WebPart description file for each control (for the `TextDisplayWebPart` and for the `UserInfoWebPart` control). 对于每个控件，单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头），在控件上的谓词菜单然后单击**导出**。For each control, click the verbs menu on the control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照说明进行操作以保存。Web 部件控件的说明文件。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 你已导出的每个控件的说明文件后，关闭网页，并编辑页面源文件在编辑器中。After you have exported a description file for each control, close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除``和``控制声明元素，然后保存并关闭文件。Delete the `` and the `` control declaration elements, then save and close the file. （您执行此步骤，若要模拟不尚没有这些控件，因此可以导入页上的控件的用户）。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have these controls, so you can import the controls to the page). 加载 Web 页，再次在浏览器中。Load the Web page again in a browser. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**目录**以切换到目录模式的页面。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在中控件中，单击**浏览**按钮，浏览到。你创建的 web 部件文件选择一个，然后单击**上传**按钮。In the control, click the **Browse** button, browse to the .WebPart files you created, select one, then click the **Upload** button. 对控件的引用应显示有一个它旁边的复选框。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 选择该复选框，然后单击**添加**控件添加到页面。Select the check box, then click **Add** to add the control to the page. 重复此过程的其他控件。Repeat this process for the other control. 虽然在此视图中的页中，单击**获取 web 部件说明**靠近底部的页后，可以看到以编程方式访问的效果的按钮对象中当前加载的控件说明控件。While you are in this view of the page, click the **Get WebPart Description** button near the bottom of the page to see the effect of programmatically accessing the object for the control description currently loaded in the control. 用于访问说明的详细信息，该方法中找到`Button1_Click`的页面源文件中，方法是方法。The method used to access the description details, found in the `Button1_Click` method of the page source, is the method. 标签在按钮的下面显示了有关控件的基本详细信息。A label below the button displays basic details about the control. 添加后的第一个控件，请重复该过程以将第二个控件添加到页。After adding the first control, repeat the process to add the second control to the page. 最后，单击**关闭**退出目录模式并返回页后，可以浏览模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. 这两个自定义控件现在应出现在页中，包含先前导出说明文件时所具有的值。Both custom controls should now appear in the page, containing the values they had when you exported description files earlier.

`TextDisplayWebPart` and for the `UserInfoWebPart` control). 对于每个控件，单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头），在控件上的谓词菜单然后单击**导出**。For each control, click the verbs menu on the control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照说明进行操作以保存。Web 部件控件的说明文件。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 你已导出的每个控件的说明文件后，关闭网页，并编辑页面源文件在编辑器中。After you have exported a description file for each control, close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除``和``控制声明元素，然后保存并关闭文件。Delete the `` and the `` control declaration elements, then save and close the file. （您执行此步骤，若要模拟不尚没有这些控件，因此可以导入页上的控件的用户）。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have these controls, so you can import the controls to the page). 加载 Web 页，再次在浏览器中。Load the Web page again in a browser. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**目录**以切换到目录模式的页面。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在中控件中，单击**浏览**按钮，浏览到。你创建的 web 部件文件选择一个，然后单击**上传**按钮。In the control, click the **Browse** button, browse to the .WebPart files you created, select one, then click the **Upload** button. 对控件的引用应显示有一个它旁边的复选框。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 控件说明上传到控件中，单击**使用 GetWebPart**靠近页面底部的按钮。Now that the control description is uploaded to the control, click the **Use GetWebPart** button near the bottom of the page. 这将演示调用的效果方法，并将其传递给当前加载的控件说明控件。This will demonstrate the effect of calling the method and passing to it the control description currently loaded in the control. 请注意，关联的服务器控件即可立即添加到网页，用户无需单击**添加**按钮。Note that the associated server control is added immediately to the Web page, without the user having to click the **Add** button. 方法，在调用`Button2_Click`方法的页面源文件中，将返回中加载的当前描述关联控件控件。The method, which is called in the `Button2_Click` method of the page source, returns the control associated with the current description that is loaded in the control. 下一步调用方法时，和控件直接添加到页。Next the method is called, and the control is directly added to the page. 此示例演示如何添加控件以编程方式从控件无需用户干预。This demonstrates how to add a control programmatically from the control without user intervention. 添加后的第一个控件，请重复该过程以将第二个控件添加到页。After adding the first control, repeat the process to add the second control to the page. 最后，单击**关闭**退出目录模式并返回页后，可以浏览模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. 这两个自定义控件现在应出现在页中，包含先前导出说明文件时所具有的值。Both custom controls should now appear in the page, containing the values they had when you exported description files earlier.
